docs.snippet: Bayern Munich kicked off the Bundesliga season in spectacular fashion, thrashing Werder Bremen, 6-0, with three goals from Robert Lewandowski....

headline.main: Bayern Starts Strong in Bid for Another Title

docs.snippet: Bobbleheads honoring Matt Harvey and lunch bags touting Steven Matz, two pitchers sidelined by injuries, were to be doled out this weekend at Citi Field....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bobbleheads honoring Matt Harvey and lunch bags touting Steven Matz, two pitchers sidelined by injuries, were to be doled out this weekend at Citi Field.
docs.abstract: New York Mets beat Philadelphia Phillies, 9-4.

headline.main: Mets Beat Phillies, but Prepare to Hand Out Reminders of Their Misfortune
headline.print_headline: Mets Win, but Prepare to Hand Out Tangible Reminders of Their Misfortune

docs.snippet: A magnetic resonance imaging test revealed a small break, Coach Jason Garrett said, after Romo was injured during a preseason game against the Seahawks....
docs.lead_paragraph: A magnetic resonance imaging test revealed a small break, Coach Jason Garrett said, after Romo was injured during a preseason game against the Seahawks.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Dallas Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo is expected to return to action later this season, despite sustaining small fracture in his back during preseason game against Seattle Seahawks; other pro football news noted.

headline.main: Dallas Cowboys Quarterback Tony Romo Has a Back Fracture
headline.print_headline: Romo’s Back Has a Fracture; Cowboys Say He Will Return

docs.snippet: Williams is recovering from a sore shoulder; Djokovic is nursing a wrist injury. Both are the top-seeded players at the tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: Williams is recovering from a sore shoulder; Djokovic is nursing a wrist injury. Both are the top-seeded players at the tournament.
docs.abstract: United States Open favorites Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic are both entering tournament with lingering injuries.

headline.main: Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic Sit Atop U.S. Open Draw, With Injuries Sharing Spotlight
headline.print_headline: Sitting Atop the U.S. Open Draw, With Injuries Sharing the Spotlight

docs.snippet: Kiplagat helped transform track and field into a multimillion-dollar business in Kenya. He was suspended as Athletics Kenya’s president in November after embezzlement allegations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kiplagat helped transform track and field into a multimillion-dollar business in Kenya. He was suspended as Athletics Kenya’s president in November after embezzlement allegations.
docs.abstract: Isaiah Kiplagat, Kenya's athletics federation president who helped successfully transform country's track and field program but was later suspended for embezzling sponsorship money from Nike, dies at age 72.

headline.main: Isaiah Kiplagat, Kenyan Sports Leader Said to Have Stolen Nike Funds, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: Isaiah Kiplagat, 72, Kenya Official Accused of Stealing From Nike

docs.snippet: A Rio de Janeiro court will return the passports of three members of the Olympic Council of Ireland (OCI) and they will be allowed to leave Brazil, a source in the Rio state security services said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Rio de Janeiro court will return the passports of three members of the Olympic Council of Ireland (OCI) and they will be allowed to leave Brazil, a source in the Rio state security services said on Friday.

headline.main: Rio Court to Return Passports to Irish Olympic Officials
headline.print_headline: Rio Court to Return Passports to Irish Olympic Officials

docs.snippet: One of Britain's leading broadcasters has blacked out its programs for an hour in hopes of spurring viewers to get some exercise....

headline.main: UK Broadcaster Shuts Down for Hour, Asks Viewers to Exercise

docs.snippet: A Brazilian court said on Saturday it has authorized the release of Ireland's Kevin James Mallon, a director of international sports hospitality company THG who was arrested on Aug. 5 for the alleged illegal scalping of Olympic tickets....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Brazilian court said on Saturday it has authorized the release of Ireland's Kevin James Mallon, a director of international sports hospitality company THG who was arrested on Aug. 5 for the alleged illegal scalping of Olympic tickets.

headline.main: Brazil Court Frees Ireland's Mallon Arrested in Rio Olympic Ticket Scam
headline.print_headline: Brazil Court Frees Ireland's Mallon Arrested in Rio Olympic Ticket Scam

docs.snippet: Danny Rose scored a second-half equaliser to cancel out James Milner's penalty as Tottenham Hotspur were fortunate to come from behind to draw 1-1 with Liverpool at White Hart Lane on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Danny Rose scored a second-half equaliser to cancel out James Milner's penalty as Tottenham Hotspur were fortunate to come from behind to draw 1-1 with Liverpool at White Hart Lane on Saturday.

headline.main: Rose Equaliser Denies Liverpool Victory at Tottenham
headline.print_headline: Rose Equaliser Denies Liverpool Victory at Tottenham
